snippet: After an eight-week hiatus, construction materials will be allowed in again starting Tuesday, but only for United Nations projects.
lead_paragraph: After an eight-week hiatus, construction materials will be allowed in again starting Tuesday, but only for United Nations projects.
abstract: Israel has agreed to restart the transfer of construction materials to the Gaza Strip after eight-week hiatus; country is under pressure from the United Nations amid a mounting economic and humanitarian crisis in Gaza.

headline.main: Israel to Allow Building Materials Into Gaza
headline.print_headline: Israel to Allow Building Materials Into Gaza

byline.contributor: Fares Akram contributed reporting from Gaza.
